title: Drawing, "Design for Checkmate Throne", 1937
medium: Brush and gouache, pen and black ink on white paper
signed: Signed in black ink, lower right: E. Mcknight Kauffer
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower right: Checkmate throne 7' to 7½' feet high / Painted in vermilion, deep gold, black / and gray on seat. Black base-
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Design for throne with trapezoidal back in orange, black and gold, with a gray seat and a black base on a black platform.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Checkmate Throne", 1937.
1937. Brush and gouache, pen and black ink on white paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-285.
